description.narrative: Gaps in the legal, political and institutional framework related to prevention, assistance and response to violence against children mapped and addressed., which contributes to Child Protection â€“ General, Education â€“ General, Justice For Children, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, Brazil's child protection system strengthened in its capacity to prevent and respond to violence against children.

title.narrative: Gaps in the legal, political and institutional framework related to prevention, assistance and response to violence againstchildren mapped and addressed.

description.narrative: Covid-19 has continued presenting challenges in the legal, political and institutional frameworksrelated to the prevention and response to VAC, expanding pre-existing gaps as well as creating new ones.UNICEF’s interventions have focused on joining efforts with stakeholders to fill these gaps with a view to strengthen the child protection system through the creation of content on prevention and response to VAC, capacity-building activities, and lobbying for legal and policy frameworks to protect children’s rights. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2022
